Package com.shashi.service.impl

Class OrderServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.shashi.service.impl.OrderServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrderService
public class OrderServiceImpl extends Object implements OrderService
Implementation of the OrderService interface. This class handles all business logic related to orders and payments.

  • Method Details

    • paymentSuccess

      public String paymentSuccess(String userName, double paidAmount)
      Processes a successful payment by creating orders for all items in the user's cart. This is a complex, high-level method that orchestrates several other services. NOTE: This method is currently untestable due to its tight coupling with other service implementations.
      Specified by:
      paymentSuccess in interface OrderService
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the customer.
      paidAmount - The total amount paid.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the status of the order placement.

      public boolean addOrder(OrderBean order)
      Adds a single order record to the database.
      Specified by:
      addOrder in interface OrderService
      Parameters:
      order - The OrderBean to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the order was added successfully, false otherwise.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      transaction - The TransactionBean to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the transaction was added successfully, false otherwise.
